verses.name: Judges 6:22
verses.text: And when Gideon perceived that he was an angel of the Lord, Gideon said, Alas, O Lord God! for because I have seen an angel of the Lord face to face.

verses.name: Judges 6:23
verses.text: And the Lord said unto him, Peace be unto thee; fear not: thou shalt not die.

verses.name: Judges 6:24
verses.text: Then Gideon built an altar there unto the Lord, and called it Jehovah–shalom: unto this day it is yet in Ophrah of the Abi–ezrites.
